DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare benefit cardiac resynchronization therapy ( CRT ) -therapy patient QRS-complex 120-150 m patient QRS-complex > 150 m .
DOC.brief_title: MODULA-Study : Modul 10 : Benefit CRT-Therapy CRT-Patients With QRS-Complex 120 - 150 Ms
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study compare benefit CRT-therapy patient QRS-complex 120-150 m patient QRS-complex > 150 m within 12 month . A benefit defined change quality life change physical ability .
DOC.criteria: Patients cardiac resynchronization therapy defibrillator ( CRTD ) cardiac resynchronization therapy pacemaker ( CRTP ) system New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) III Ejection fraction ( EF ) 35 % Optimised medical therapy QRScomplex 120 m Patients CRTP atrial fibrillation
